mapper.select: SELECT PLACE_NUM, PLACE_NAME, ADDRESS_NAME, ROAD_ADDRESS_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, PHONE, X, Y, PLACE_URL FROM PET_MEDICENTER WHERE X < (#{myX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}+0.05) AND X > (#{myX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}-0.05) OR Y < (#{myY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}+0.00015) AND Y > (#{myY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}-0.00015)
SELECT PLACE_NUM, PLACE_NAME, ADDRESS_NAME, ROAD_ADDRESS_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, PHONE, X, Y, PLACE_URL FROM PET_MEDICENTER WHERE PLACE_NUM = #{PLACE_NUM}
